doc.after: During construction the Battery Park City Authority in conjunction with the Percent for Art Program of the City of New York the Department of Cultural Affairs and the New York City Board of Education commissioned Mnemonics an artwork by public artists Kristin Jones and Andrew Ginzel Four hundred hollow glass blocks were dispersed randomly from the basement to the tenth floor of the new Stuyvesant High School building Each block contains relics providing evidence of geographical natural cultural and social worlds from antiquity to the present time
